QuestData.Title: Lost Mole Machines
QuestData.Description: Few people know the Blackrock clan better than Dark Iron dwarves.$b$bSo after Tanaan, we sent a bunch of mole machines to Gorgrond to build a listenin' post to keep an eye on them.$b$bMe own mole machine got way off course an' I got separated. It didn't take long to figure out all the other mole machines got off course as well.$b$bAccordin' to the readin's in me tank, a mole machine surfaced somewhere way to the west of here.$b$bMind scoutin' ahead while we get this tank operational?
QuestData.CompletionText: I came here to fight the Blackrock clan, not get lost in the jungle.
QuestData.RewardText: Well, that's one down, and about a dozen others to go. We best get a base goin'. Sounds like we might be here a while.
